name: A. I m bored with life
statement:
Holidays have finished. Thanks to the help of the hacker Leha, Noora
managed to enter the university of her dreams which is located in a town
Pavlopolis. It’s well known that universities provide students with
dormitory for the period of university studies. Consequently Noora had
to leave Vi kopolis and move to Pavlopolis. Thus Leha was left
completely alone in a quiet town Vi kopolis. He almost even fell into a
depression from boredom!Leha came up with a task for himself to relax a
little. He chooses two integers and and then calculates the greatest
common divisor of integers " factorial" and " factorial". Formally the
hacker wants to find out GCD. It’s well known that the factorial of an
integer is a product of all positive integers less than or equal to .
Thus . For example . Recall that GCD is the largest positive integer
that divides (without a remainder) both and .Leha has learned how to
solve this task very effective. You are able to cope with it not worse,
aren’t you?
